title: [Large-scale] Metacognitive Strategy Development Process in Hypermedia Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and advanced expertise in social sciences
context.additional_context: Need to strengthen learning strategies in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply metacognitive strategies (planning-monitoring-evaluation) with over 85% accuracy in a hypermedia environment.
Learners can identify three or more cognitive obstacles encountered while navigating online learning materials and explain coping strategies.
Learners can record and analyze learning outcomes using self-assessment tools three or more times and develop improvement plans.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
